ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( SObjectType__r.DeveloperName != 'LogEntryEvent', SObjectType__r.DeveloperName != 'Log', SObjectType__r.DeveloperName != 'LogEntry', SObjectType__r.DeveloperName != 'LogEntryTag', SObjectType__r.DeveloperName != 'LoggerTag' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Plugins are not supported for this SObject Handler
